These online payment terms and conditions apply to your use of the online payment transaction made available by Villa Filomena Resorts Management. 

The following terms and conditions are strictly implemented for check-in guests. 

PAYMENT 
Once you are ready to make a payment, we will create a pencil booking (temporary reservation). Pencil bookings are held for 24 hours only. Once 24 hours have passed and no payment is made, the date(s) will be opened up again without further notice. 

Reservation is confirmed only when the 50% down payment is received. 

Balance is payable to the caretaker upon check-in. In the course of online payment, only online payment via GCash app will be accepted. Prior proof of payment is required for verification processes. 

Payments shall be made only using GCash app. Upon completing a transaction on our website, you will be presented with a confirmation screen verifying the transaction details you wish to process. It is your responsibility to verify that all transaction information and other details are correct. 

Villa Filomena has no liability for transactions which are incorrect as a result of inaccurate data entry in the course of the use of the service or for loss of data or information caused by factors beyond our control. 

You will receive a confirmation email once the payment has been received. 

Once a payment has been made it cannot be cancelled unless otherwise stated (please see refunds and cancellations section for your reference). We do not accept any responsibility for refusal orr reversal of payments. 


REFUNDS AND CANCELLATIONS 
1. The down payment is non-refundable. However, the deposit may be used to rebook to a future date if the guests fail to show up on the reserved date due to unforeseen events (e.g. typhoons, floods, sudden change of quarantine status/guidelines). 
2. Rebooking and/or change of date is only allowed when done at least 14 days prior to check-in date. 
3. For re-bookings due to COVID-19 or other health-related reasons, the guest will be required to provide proof (i.e. doctor's note, medical certificate or a positive COVID-19 test results). The proof must be dated after the reservation was made. As soon as you have the proof, kindly contact us immediately. You can choose to redact sensitive information (except for name and date) before sending the proof. Rest assured that we will treat your disclosure with utmost privacy. 
4. Other reasons for re-booking will be treated on a case-to-case basis after the 14-day grace period. 
5. No shows will be considered a cancellation and no refund will be issued. 

DATA COLLECTION AND PRIVACY 
We will comply with the Privacy Act 2020 in relation to a ny applicable information you supply to us. 

Villa Filomena resorts shall keep the information and files received from you or from third parties in the strictest confidence. By providing information to Villa Filomena resorts for the purpose of availing services, you expressly consent to the processing of your supplies user data, as may be applicable for your pertinent transaction using the GCash App. Provided that your data may either be personal information or non-personal information. 

Please read them carefully, [by clicking the check in the box], you agree to be bound by the provisions of these terms.
